title: Rolling
name: myday
description: A Real-time Messaging Platform powered by React, Vite, Node.js Express and Typescript. Seamlessly integrates sockets for live chat experience, One-on-one chats, groups chats, enriched by diverse message formats including text, audio, images and files.Using MongoDB with Mongoose for data integrity, user authentication and for advanced and scalable communication.
architecture: This application build with react for front-end side using Redux for state management, Scss & MUI for styling, Axios for HTTP requests, Node.js & Express framework for backend side using routing, request handling and middleware management, MongoDB for database and Mongoose for modeling data.

title: Airbnb
name: airbnb
description: Vacation rental application to find and rent places around the world, in this app you can become a host and post your place to everybody or pick a place for your next vacation. built with Angular, Node.js, Express & MongoDB. The app is a clone of Airbnb, it includes a map, advanced search, user authentication, i18n and more.
architecture: This application built with Angular for front-end side using MVC architecture, Rxjs for asynchronous programming to handle events, SCSS for styling, RestAPI for HTTP methods, Node.js & Express framework for backend side using routing, request handling and middleware management, MongoDB for database and Mongoose for modeling data.

title: My-Day
name: myday
description: Task managment application inspired by Monday.com, this project produced for manage projects and tasks in each way you choose The app is built with React, Redux, Node.js, Express & MongoDB. It includes user authentication, drag & drop, end to end testing, high security and more.
architecture: This application build with react for front-end side using Redux for state management, Scss & MUI for styling, Axios for HTTP requests, Node.js & Express framework for backend side using routing, request handling and middleware management, MongoDB for database and Mongoose for modeling data.

title: Fafos
name: fafos
description: Fafos is a e-commerce application built with Next.JS, React, Typescript, Firebase, MongoDB. This app includes a shopping cart, user authentication, admin panel, and more.
architecture: This application built with Next.js for using SSR, React for frontend side, TypeScript as programming language React-Context for state management, Tailwind CSS for styling, RestAPI for HTTP requests and methods manipulation andFirebase for user authentication.
